title: George Will: Where conservatives go now
description: Chuck talks with George Will, syndicated columnist and the author of a new book, “American Happiness and Discontents,” in which he writes about Afghanistan, social-distancing and of course, American history.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Chuck talks with George Will, syndicated columnist and the author of a new book, “American Happiness and Discontents,” in which he writes about Afghanistan, social-distancing and of course, American history.
itunes:title: George Will: Where conservatives go now
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: George Will talks to Chuck Todd about the true meaning of conservatism in an age of Trumpism.
